PRODUCT.TITLE: Unicorn Tears Gin Liqueur
PRODUCT.DESC: Bringing you this enchantingly scrumptious Gin Liqueur has been no easy feat.

PRODUCT.TITLE: Stress Sausage
PRODUCT.DESC: Squish away your stress with these marvellous meat packages. With three varieties of pork sword to choose from, simply squeeze away any unwanted emotions.

PRODUCT.TITLE: Ugly Chrismtas Sweater Kit
PRODUCT.DESC: The Ugly Christmas Sweater Kit includes a quality cotton crew-neck sweater and all the decorations needed to craft something gloriously festive, jolly and hideous.

PRODUCT.TITLE: Star Wars 3D Wall Lights
PRODUCT.DESC: Available in 2 styles, these eye-catching lights are going to light up the dark side of your house. Quite literally. With no wires or cables you can also pretend they're powered by 'the force', which is of course hilarious.

PRODUCT.TITLE: Magical Unicorn Slippiers
PRODUCT.DESC: What we all need is a bit of enchantment in our daily movements. These plush Magical Unicorn Slippers are just the trick.

PRODUCT.TITLE: Obama Llama
PRODUCT.DESC: Oozing the weirdest, most wonderfulest rhymes youâ€™ve ever heard, your job is to mime, act out and describe these rhymes while other players get over excited, shriek answers at you and possibly self combust.
